docs.title: home
docs.text: hi, i am gabriel minoru since starting with ml in college (2015), i've completed a data science internship, held multiple data science roles, and now work as an ml/data platform engineer at Grupo SBF (Brazil). my current stack includes python, k8s, terraform, and gcp.

docs.title: PRINT
docs.text: PRINT is just a function to make prints look nice

docs.title: installation
docs.text:
pip install mino-print

or even better

uv add mino-print
